p: There are fewer data on the acaricidal effects, but they still show promise regarding the control of pests in a wide variety of crops and cattle. In this field, we also found many studies on the use of the EOs as acaricides, for instance extracts of Lippia gracilis against Tetranychus urticae [ 8] or Ocimum gratissimum against Rhipicephalus microplus [ 95].
